text.section: Except as otherwise provided in Part II of this subtitle, a person may not act as a peddler unless the person has a peddler license.

A peddler is considered to be acting as a peddler without a peddler license if the peddler:
acts or offers to act as a peddler without the peddler license with the peddler at the time; or
fails to show the peddler license to a law enforcement officer on request.
A person who violates this section is guilty of a misdemeanor and, on conviction, is subject to a fine not exceeding $100.
